vernac_cmds: Require Import utils_tac gcd rel_iter sums.
Fact sum_0n_distr_in_out n a b f : ∑ n (fun i => (a i+b i) * f i) = ∑ n (fun i => a i * f i) + ∑ n (fun i => b i * f i).
Let power_nzero x : power x p <> 0.
Fact power_decomp_lt n f a q : (forall i j, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i, i < n -> f i < q) -> (forall i, i < n -> a i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i => a i * power (f i) p) < power q p.
revert q; induction n as [ | n IHn ]; intros q Hf1 Hf2 Ha.
apply lt_le_trans with (1*power (f n) p + a n * power (f n) p).
Lemma power_decomp_is_digit n a f : (forall i j, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i, i < n -> a i < p) -> forall i, i < n -> is_digit (∑ n (fun i => a i * power (f i) p)) p (f i) (a i).
induction n as [ | n IHn ]; intros i Hi.
exists (∑ (n-i) (fun j => a (S i + j) * power (f (S i+j) - f i - 1) p)), (∑ i (fun j => a j * power (f j) p)); split.
replace (S n) with (S i + (n-i)) by omega.

Theorem power_decomp_unique n f a b : (forall i j, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i, i < n -> a i = b i.
intros Hf Ha Hb E i Hi.
generalize (power_decomp_is_digit _ _ Hf Ha Hi) (power_decomp_is_digit _ _ Hf Hb Hi).

Theorem power_decomp_factor n f a : (forall i, 0 < i < S n -> f 0 < f i) -> ∑ (S n) (fun i => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i => a (S i) * power (f (S i) - f 0 - 1) p) * power (S (f 0)) p + a 0 * power (f 0) p.
Let power_nzero x : power x p <> 0.
Let lt_minus_cancel a b c : a < b < c -> b - a - 1 < c - a - 1.

Theorem power_decomp_unique' n f a b : (forall i j, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i, i < n -> a i = b i.
induction n as [ | n IHn ]; intros f a b Hf Ha Hb.
assert (forall i, 0 < i < S n -> f 0 < f i) by (intros; apply Hf; omega).
apply IHn with (4 := E1); try omega.
intros u j Hu; apply lt_minus_cancel; split; apply Hf; omega.
Let power_2_inj_1 i j n : j < i -> 2* power n 2 <> power i 2 + power j 2.
destruct (lt_eq_lt_dec i (S n)) as [ [ H5 | H5 ] | H5 ].
apply power_mono_l with (x := 2) in H5; auto.
apply power_mono_l with (x := 2) in H4; auto.
apply power_mono_l with (x := 2) in H5; auto.
Fact power_2_inj i j : power i 2 = power j 2 -> i = j.
destruct (lt_eq_lt_dec i j) as [ [ C | C ] | C ]; auto; apply power_smono_l with (x := 2) in C; omega.
Let power_plus_lt a b c : a < b < c -> power a 2 + power b 2 < power c 2.
apply power_mono_l with (x := 2) in H2; auto.
apply power_smono_l with (x := 2) in H1; auto.
Let power_inj_2 i1 j1 i2 j2 : j1 < i1 -> j2 < i2 -> power i1 2 + power j1 2 = power i2 2 + power j2 2 -> i1 = i2 /\ j1 = j2.
destruct (lt_eq_lt_dec i1 i2) as [ [ C | C ] | C ].
generalize (@power_plus_lt j1 i1 i2); intros; omega.
split; auto; apply power_2_inj; subst; omega.
generalize (@power_plus_lt j2 i2 i1); intros; omega.
Theorem sum_2_power_2_injective i1 j1 i2 j2 : j1 <= i1 -> j2 <= i2 -> power i1 2 + power j1 2 = power i2 2 + power j2 2 -> i1 = i2 /\ j1 = j2.
destruct (eq_nat_dec i1 j1) as [ H3 | H3 ]; destruct (eq_nat_dec i2 j2) as [ H4 | H4 ].
do 2 rewrite mult_2_eq_plus, <- power_S in E.
subst j1; rewrite mult_2_eq_plus in E.

command: revert q; induction n as [ | n IHn ]; intros q Hf1 Hf2 Ha.
apply lt_le_trans with (1*power (f n) p + a n * power (f n) p).
induction n as [ | n IHn ]; intros i Hi.
exists (∑ (n-i) (fun j => a (S i + j) * power (f (S i+j) - f i - 1) p)), (∑ i (fun j => a j * power (f j) p)); split.
replace (S n) with (S i + (n-i)) by omega.
intros Hf Ha Hb E i Hi.
generalize (power_decomp_is_digit _ _ Hf Ha Hi) (power_decomp_is_digit _ _ Hf Hb Hi).
induction n as [ | n IHn ]; intros f a b Hf Ha Hb.
assert (forall i, 0 < i < S n -> f 0 < f i) by (intros; apply Hf; omega).
apply IHn with (4 := E1); try omega.
intros u j Hu; apply lt_minus_cancel; split; apply Hf; omega.
destruct (lt_eq_lt_dec i (S n)) as [ [ H5 | H5 ] | H5 ].
apply power_mono_l with (x := 2) in H5; auto.
apply power_mono_l with (x := 2) in H4; auto.
apply power_mono_l with (x := 2) in H5; auto.
destruct (lt_eq_lt_dec i j) as [ [ C | C ] | C ]; auto; apply power_smono_l with (x := 2) in C; omega.
apply power_mono_l with (x := 2) in H2; auto.
apply power_smono_l with (x := 2) in H1; auto.
destruct (eq_nat_dec i1 j1) as [ H3 | H3 ]; destruct (eq_nat_dec i2 j2) as [ H4 | H4 ].
do 2 rewrite mult_2_eq_plus, <- power_S in E.
subst j1; rewrite mult_2_eq_plus in E.
